title: LLP Rules Effective Date Extended to February 16, 2026 – An Important MCA Update!
content:
# LLP Rules Effective Date Extended to February 16, 2026 – An Important MCA Update!

Ek important update hai for all LLPs and professionals. Government ne Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) Rules ke effective date ko extend kiya hai.

The Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) ne announce kiya hai ki October 2025 mein publish kiye gaye LLP Rules ka effective date ab defer kar diya gaya hai.

*   **Old Effective Date:** The rules were initially set to be effective from January 1, 2026.
*   **New Effective Date:** The new effective date for these LLP Rules is now February 16, 2026.
*   **Notification Details:** This extension has been notified vide **S.O. 6114(E)**, dated December 30, 2025, which amends the earlier notification S.O. 4851(E) dated October 23, 2025.
*   **Reason:** This move provides a bit more breathing room for stakeholders to prepare for the implementation of these rules.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Visit the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) website for updates](https://www.mca.gov.in/)

*Published on: 7 January 2026*
